name: free-mint
description: This contract is a simple ERC721 contract that allows for a single free mint per wallet.

scripts.coverage: forge coverage --report lcov && lcov --remove lcov.info 'test/*.sol'  -o lcov_filtered.info && genhtml lcov_filtered.info --branch-coverage --output-dir coverage --ignore-errors category && rm lcov.info && rm lcov_filtered.info && open coverage/src/src/index.html

author: Jason Schwarz (https://www.jasonschwarz.xyz/)
